    public static class ShealthSensorDevice.Pedometer
extends ShealthSensorDevice.Health
implements ShealthContract.Constants.StepsType, ShealthContract.Constants.DistanceUnit, ShealthContract.Constants.SpeedUnit, ShealthContract.Constants.CaloriesUnit, ShealthContract.Constants.DeviceSamplePositionType
    Class to send measure data for pedometer.
